data.text:
We stayed at this hotel, 2 couples.
We had a great stay, didn't spend much time at the hotel.
The location was good.
The continental breakfast was nice, coffee was good from the machine
The rooms were spacious enough.
Large bathroom with a good shower.
data.title: Great location, comfortable rooms

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear  Guest,

Thank you for your positive feedback.

We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us.

We would be happy to welcome you back anytime.

Kind Regards,
Best 4 Barcelona
owner_response.author: Pilar Rios

data.text: The hotel was in a good location near the beach, underground and bus stop. It maybe a little far out if only staying for 1 or 2 nights but we were here for 4 nights so was able to travel in to the tourist areas. Rooms were clean and tidy. Breakfast room is very small and can be quite busy at peak times. Although it states hot breakfast there was only bacon, scrambled eggs and some tiny sausage pieces sometimes.
data.title: Nice stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Zoe W,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We're glad to hear that you found our hotel to be conveniently located near the beach, underground, and bus stop. We understand that our location might be a bit distant if you're staying for only 1 or 2 nights, but we're pleased that it worked well for your 4-night stay, allowing you to explore the tourist areas.

We appreciate your comments regarding the cleanliness of our rooms. Ensuring a comfortable and tidy environment for our guests is one of our top priorities.

We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced in our breakfast room. We understand that it can become busy during peak times, and we'll certainly look into ways to improve the space to better accommodate our guests. Your feedback regarding the breakfast offerings is also noted.

Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for an even more enjoyable stay in the future.

Best regards,

Hotel Best 4 Barcelona
owner_response.author: Pilar Rios

data.text: We liked the hotel. It was clean and had lots of utensils in the bathroom (hair brush, creams, toothbrush etc). The only downside was scrambled eggs on breakfast - It was egg powder not a real fresh scrambled eggs. The rest was nice, basic fresh breakfast stuff (bread, ham, cheese, veggies). I was scared of the elevator as it made a horrifying sound.
data.title: Very nice!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Andrzej P,

Thank you for your review! We're glad you liked our hotel and appreciated the cleanliness and bathroom amenities provided. 

We apologize that you didn't enjoy the scrambled eggs at breakfast; we'll take your feedback into consideration to improve that aspect. We're pleased that you enjoyed the rest of the breakfast, which includes basic and fresh items. We're sorry to hear that the elevator noise scared you; we'll take steps to address this issue. 

We hope to see you again soon!

Hotel Best 4 Barcelona
owner_response.author: Pilar Rios

data.text: Amazing place to rest, the room was pretty comfortable, stuff are really kind always helps us with all questions, breakfast is really good, safety zone and near from metro station. Barcelona is a beautiful city to visit, there are a lot of things to do.
data.title: Amazing experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Andres Ricardo S,

Thank you for your wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear that you had an amazing stay with us. It's fantastic that you found our rooms comfortable, our staff kind and helpful, and enjoyed our delicious breakfast. We're also glad you appreciated our convenient location near the metro station, allowing you to explore the beautiful city of Barcelona easily.

We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future for another enjoyable stay.

Best regards,

Hotel Best 4 Barcelona
owner_response.author: Pilar Rios

data.text: Very Friendly staf, good food, croasants were very delicious,clean rooms and very close to the beach. The staff was very hepful when we wanted something.  Me and my friends RECOMAND THIS HOTEL becouse  it was  cheap and very very good. You will not be desepointed.
data.title: Excelent

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Hana R,

Thank you for your stay and for your time in sharing your experience. We are glad to know that everything was to your liking.

We hope to see you again in the future on your visit to Barcelona.

Sincerely,

Hotel Best 4 Barcelona
owner_response.author: Werner Francis
